lab5MotorBoats

Class MotorBoat

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab5MotorBoats.MotorBoat

  • public class MotorBoat
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will hold the complete assignment from the motorboat assignment
    Author:
    Ylva

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int capacity
      The capacity of the fuel tank
      private double currentSpeed
      The current speed of this motorboat
      private double maxSpeed
      The maximum speed of this motorboat

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MotorBoat()
      Default constructor, sets all variables to 0 This constructor should only rarely be used
      MotorBoat(int capacity)
      Constructor that sets the capacity of the fuel tank, all other variables are set to 0
      MotorBoat(int capacity, double maxSpeed)
      Constructor that sets the capacity of the fuel tank to the input.
      MotorBoat(int capacity, double maxSpeed, double currentSpeed)
      Will check if the currentSpeed is not larger as the max speed, otherwise will change the currentSpeed to the maximum speed

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private boolean checkSpeed()
      Checks if the motorboat is not going to go faster then his maximum speed
      static boolean compareCurrentSpeed(MotorBoat first, MotorBoat second)
      Will compare which motorboat is going faster Should be just in conjunction with the testCurrentSpeed method
      static boolean compareHighestMaxSpeed(MotorBoat first, MotorBoat second)
      Will compare which motorboat can go faster Should be just in conjunction with the testMaxSpeed method
      int getCapacity() 
      double getCurrentSpeed() 
      double getMaxSpeed() 
      void setCapacity(int capacity) 
      boolean setCurrentSpeed(double currentSpeed)
      Sets the current speed for this MotorBoat object Will fail if the currentSpeed to set it to is higher then the maximum speed When it fails it will reset the currentSpeed to its old currentSpeed
      void setMaxSpeed(double maxSpeed) 
      static boolean testCapacity(MotorBoat first, MotorBoat second)
      Will test if 2 MotorBoat object have the same capacity in their fuel tank
      static boolean testCurrentSpeed(MotorBoat first, MotorBoat second)
      Will check if the current speed of the 2 motorboat objects are the same Can be used in conjunction with the compareCurrentSpeed method
      static boolean testMaxSpeed(MotorBoat first, MotorBoat second)
      Will check if the maximum speed of the 2 motorboat objects are the same Can be used in conjunction with the compareHighestMaxSpeed method

      • MotorBoat

         double maxSpeed)
        Constructor that sets the capacity of the fuel tank to the input. And sets the maxSpeed to the input
        Parameters:
        capacity - The capacity which this MotorBoat object should have
        maxSpeed - The maximum speed which this MotorBoat object should have

      • MotorBoat

        public MotorBoat(int capacity,
         double maxSpeed,
         double currentSpeed)

        Parameters:
        capacity - The capacity which this MotorBoat object should have
        maxSpeed - The maximum speed which this MotorBoat object should have
        currentSpeed - The current speed which this MotorBoat object should have

    • Method Detail

      • checkSpeed

        private boolean checkSpeed()
        Checks if the motorboat is not going to go faster then his maximum speed
        Returns:
        a true if the speed is correct

      • testMaxSpeed

        public static boolean testMaxSpeed(MotorBoat first,
                   MotorBoat second)
        Will check if the maximum speed of the 2 motorboat objects are the same Can be used in conjunction with the compareHighestMaxSpeed method
        Parameters:
        first - The first MototBoat object
        second - The second MotorBoat object
        Returns:
        true if both MotorBoat object have the same maximum speed

      • compareHighestMaxSpeed

        public static boolean compareHighestMaxSpeed(MotorBoat first,
                             MotorBoat second)
        Will compare which motorboat can go faster Should be just in conjunction with the testMaxSpeed method
        Parameters:
        first - The first MotorBoat object
        second - The MotorBoat object to compare to.
        Returns:
        true if the first motorboat has an higher speed then the second

      • testCurrentSpeed

        public static boolean testCurrentSpeed(MotorBoat first,
                       MotorBoat second)
        Will check if the current speed of the 2 motorboat objects are the same Can be used in conjunction with the compareCurrentSpeed method
        Parameters:
        first - The first MototBoat object
        second - The second MotorBoat object
        Returns:
        true if both MotorBoat object have the same maximum speed

      • compareCurrentSpeed

        public static boolean compareCurrentSpeed(MotorBoat first,
                          MotorBoat second)
        Will compare which motorboat is going faster Should be just in conjunction with the testCurrentSpeed method
        Parameters:
        first - The first MotorBoat object
        second - The MotorBoat object to compare to.
        Returns:
        true if the first motorboat has an higher speed then the second

      • testCapacity

        public static boolean testCapacity(MotorBoat first,

        Parameters:
        first - the first MotorBoat object to test
        second - the second MotorBoat object to test
        Returns:
        true if the capacities are the same

      • setCurrentSpeed

        public boolean setCurrentSpeed(double currentSpeed)
        Sets the current speed for this MotorBoat object Will fail if the currentSpeed to set it to is higher then the maximum speed When it fails it will reset the currentSpeed to its old currentSpeed
        Parameters:
        currentSpeed - the speed to set this MotorBoat to
        Returns:
        a true if successfully changed the speed
